Pre-Game Insights: Morne Morkel is reportedly not happy with the bowling effort Hardik Pandya is putting up in the nets.
Others: Hardik Pandya played a crucial role in India's T20 World Cup 2024 win but faced the wrath of the fans throughout the IPL season before he silenced his critics by winning the coveted trophy for his country.
India wrapped up a 2-0 clean sweep against Bangladesh in the Test series, and now attention turns to the upcoming 3-match T20I series.

Emerging talents like Harshit Rana and Mayank Yadav, who impressed with their performances in the IPL, will be eager to carry that momentum into the T20Is, having earned the confidence of the BCCI selection panel.
